title: Outcast Second Contact 2017  ENG-MaX
description:
Outcast Second Contact (2017 / ENG / License)

Year: November 14, 2017 
Genre: Action / Adventure / RPG / Open World / 3rd Person / 3D / 
Developer: Appeal 
Publisher: Bigben Interactive 
Platform: PC 
Publication Type: License 
Language: English / MULTi13 Voice 
Language: English / French / German

GAME INFO:
The cult game Outcast, which breathed life into the adventure genre in the open world, is returned with Outcast - Second Contact. Explore the planet Adelpha, equally beautiful and dangerous, and decide the fate of the two worlds. Take on the role of Cutter Slade, experienced soldier of the real elite troops, and explore the planet Adelpha, using full freedom. Traveling through this magnificent world, where magic and science mingled, you will discover exotic cities, confront cruel enemies and try to learn the secrets of a developed civilization. Make the right choice in this living world, because the fate of these two universes depends on your successes.

SETUP INFO:
1. Launch Setup 
2. Install the game
3. The contents of the Crackfolder to the folder with the game  
4. Play.
 
Tabletka: Present (CODEX) Operating system: Windows 7 / Windows 8 / Windows 10 64bits or higher Processor: 4th Gen Intel® Core ™ i5 Processors / AMD FX® 8300 Memory: 6 GB RAM Video: GeForce GTX670 / AMD Radeon® 7950 DirectX: Versions 11 Disk space: 15 GB
